label.label: toggling of effects for outputs A-D:
toggling of effects for outputs A-D:
The CV values on this page are unique in that each CV represents the lighting selection for two different outputs.
The CV values on this page are unique in that each CV represents the lighting selection for two different outputs.
The tens digit of the value corresponds to one output, and the ones digit corresponds to the other output.
The tens digit of the value corresponds to one output, and the ones digit corresponds to the other output.
Example: A value of 23 below results in a Gyra light at output B and a strobe at output A.
Example: A value of 23 below results in a Gyra light at output B and a strobe at output A.
available for outputs A and B
available for outputs A and B
